name: JUICY SACRIFICES
description:
In Juicy Sacrifices you are a group of fruits who are trying to escape from the kitchen. After each level you must sacrifice a certain fruit. Each fruit has its own abilities:

APPLE:
Normal Speed
Can turn in to regular apple mid jump to slow down(Down arrow)

Orange:
Immune to mold
Has faster movement and jump speed

Banana:
Slower than the others
Can fly using a helicopter(Down arrow)

There is now music in this game because I ran out of time. If there are any bugs leave them in the comments.

Thank you for playing my game.
